title: Isle Royale National Park: Commercial Use Authorizations
body: Commercial Use Authorizations       The application period for Commercial Use Authorizations (CUA) will be January 1 through May 15.  If you want to conduct commercial activities within Isle Royale National Park, please follow the instructions contained in these documents.  Please contact (906) 487-7178 with questions regarding a CUA.      Application  Attachment A        Risk Release Letter  Attachment B     Find attachments for specific use CUAs below:    Sport Diving Charters (SCUBA) Guided Backpacking Trips Kayak Excursions Sport Fishing Charters Guided Tour   If you are conducting a Guided Tour, please make a note on your application.    There is an annual non-refundable fee of $200 for a CUA.  Visit pay.gov to pay your fee.
